message.content:
1. Secondary end points were significantly improved compared to placebo.
2. Reduced tearing was most prominently improved at all study visits.
3. Reduced eyelid swelling was significantly improved at the onset of action.
4. Reduced eyelid swelling was significantly improved at the 8-hour study visits.

messages.content:
Statement: Secondary end points were also significantly improved compared to placebo, most prominently for reduced tearing at all study visits and reduced eyelid swelling at the onset of action and 8-hour study visits.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
